## SerializedScalarStateType type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SerializedScalarStateType<S, T> = StateType<
  S,
  T,
  {
    value: T
    get(): T
    set(value: T | ((currentValue: T) => T)): void
  }
>
```
